typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	LatestTiingoFolder as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 100,
	rowUrlColumn: 'FilePath',
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine',
	wildcardPaths:[(concat('RAW/Tiingo/',$LatestTiingoFolder,'/','*'))]) ~> RawTiingo
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 100) ~> GetActiveStockList
RawTiingo alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> UpsertbyRow
UpsertbyRow derive(Ticker = left(substring(FilePath,22), (length(substring(FilePath,22)) - 5 ) )) ~> NewColTicker
ConditionalSplit1@ActiveStocks derive(LastUpdateDateKey = $LatestTiingoFolder) ~> UpdateLastUpdateDateKey
GetActiveStockList split(equals(toString(byName('Active')),'1'),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(ActiveStocks, NonActiveStocks)
UpdateLastUpdateDateKey, ConditionalSplit1@NonActiveStocks union(byName: true)~> UnionActiveStockList
NewColTicker sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	compressionType: 'snappy',
	compressionLevel: 'Fastest',
	container: 'datalake',
	folderPath: 'BASE/EoDStockPrice',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['date','Ticker'],
	partitionFileNames:['TiingoEoDPrices.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> BASETiingo
